headline: Sentiment down 196% this week, optimism declining
key_insights: Fears trending up 180% over 7 days (strong momentum)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations dominate with 156 quotes despite falling from yesterday's peak - 130 strong-intensity quotes are driving the high score of 90.7.

• This remains well above the category's typical range, though down from yesterday's near-record high of 110.2.

• Fears surged dramatically from -7.7 to 26.2, hitting the 43-day high with 34 strong-intensity quotes among 77 total.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
